data.text: @Lingua___ Hi Lingua, if you are over your 28th week of pregnancy, please provide a medical certificate confirming that you are fit to travel by air. domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Martin Lewis Money Show
entity.description: Financial guru Martin Lewis presents this half-hour programme on which he provides ways for people to get the best deals for their money. Each episode acts as a masterclass that offers practical, money-saving tips for viewers. Angellica Bell puts Lewis' advice to use, using it to see if she can save money. The show sees Martin looking into difficulties for first-time buyers trying to get on the property ladder, rising energy prices, a range of high street offers, the financial toll of Christmas time and much more. Alongside co-host Angellica Bell, he'll also be hoping to cut through some of the current confusion answering viewers burning questions on how Brexit might impact on everything from holidays to the pound people's pockets.

data.text: @al_exe Hi, if your flight was cancelled, then you can rebook it for free or request 120% WIZZ credits or 100% original payment refund. You can do it is under your WIZZ profile. If you need further assistance please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/4KXMx8pBhX.
@sjkarl69 Hi! If you type "chat with an agent" to Amelia then she'll connect you to an available agent as soon as possible. Have a nice day!
@CarlaManc Hi there! If you requested it through website/application, you will receive your credits in 72 hours. Have a nice day!

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.description: A taxonomy of user interests.
